description: This file initializes a SearxngTools instance for searching, creates an agent with this tool, and demonstrates how to perform a search and get a summarized response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using tools.

classes.name: SearxngTools
classes.description: A class encapsulating the Searxng search engine configuration and operations.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to output the response to a given prompt.
